summary: More manageable weights for Linen, Pickaxe, Wood Axe, and Firewood
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a larger scale enveloping many things? 
Check out WezEllison\'s \"Less Annoying Weights\" mod- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4949

This was a mod I made in all of twenty minutes with the ck, fixing what I believe to be proposterously high weight values. (A small linen wrap weighing as much as glass boots????) so I went in and put them at a more reasonable weight vale.

Things this mod changes; 

linen wraps- weight .2 instead of 2.

Woodcutter\'s axe- weight 2 instead of 10

Pick Axe- same as WC\'s

Firewood- 2 instead of 5.
--------------------------------------
I like the number 2 :)
--------------------------------------


INSTALLATION-

extract to your data folder.
--------------------------------------

UNINSTALLATION-

Delete \"Xeno_Sensible_Weights.esp\"


This is my first mod, be gentle
author: TheXenophobe
